name: Cyber Jukebox Hero
description:
WARNING, the game is really big (170Mo) due to the 40 songs inside ! Wait for the loading !

This game was inspired by the Two Hour Album Challenge - Volume 13

CONTROLS:

Simply click on the tabs, and then on a number [A1 to B5], and make people who enjoy this type of music come in your pub !

And play in fullscreen ! (arrows in the bottom right)

This game was made in 10 days for the OST Jam. It was supposed to be a management game, with gold to earn from clients and songs/tabs to unlock, but I kinda overscoped again... So it's simply a fancy way of listening to songs from the 2HAC - Volume 13

Musics used:

  • A-D-D-F_Toxic - Still We're Curious
  • Abstraction - I've Got Tech
